personal_income_tax.exemptions: 15th month pay and other fringe benefits.

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 25% for businesses with annual sales below 3 million PHP.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 10% for dividends paid to resident individuals or corporations; 25% for dividends paid to non-resident corporations.
withholding_taxes.interest: 20% for interest paid to resident individuals or corporations; 30% for interest paid to non-resident individuals or corporations.
withholding_taxes.royalties: 25% for royalties paid to non-resident individuals or corporations.

corporate_tax.deductions: R&D expenses, depreciation, cost of goods sold.

rate.short_term_rate: 15% for shares held less than 1 year.
rate.long_term_rate: 5% for shares held more than 1 year.

rate.short_term_rate: 6% for properties held for less than 5 years.
rate.long_term_rate: 0% for properties held for 5 years or more.

rate.short_term_rate: 15% for assets held less than 1 year.
rate.long_term_rate: 5% for assets held more than 1 year.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

property_tax.rate: 0.5% - 2% of assessed value, varying by property type and location.
property_tax.exemptions: Owner-occupied residential properties with an assessed value of less than 1,000,000 PHP.

inheritance_tax.rate: 6% - 20% depending on the relationship of the heir to the deceased and the value of the inheritance.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Visa valid for 59 days upon arrival; can be extended to 36 months.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Exemption from income tax on foreign-sourced income for the first year.

special_economic_zones.name: Makati Business District
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Tax holidays, reduced corporate income tax, tax credits.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

additional_notes.political_risks: Moderate political risks; tax policies may change due to economic or political instability.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Strong economic growth; positive outlook for tax revenue.
additional_notes.legal_system: Civil law system; disputes can be time-consuming.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 95th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
